text: Lorand Gaspar (28 February 1925 – 9 October 2019) was a Hungarian–born French poet. He was born in Târgu Mureș, Hungary. He published his first verse collection in 1966, Le Quatrième État de la matière (Flammarion) and published a number of prose works and travel books as a photographer. Gaspar died on 9 October 2019 in Paris at the age of 94.Les Entrelacs d’Aymen Hacen : Lorand Gaspar n’est plus ==References== Category:1925 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Hungarian poets Category:French poets
title: Lorand Gaspar
